short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace a popular celebrity and his companies with the Muppet, Salacious B Crumb, and his companies. All in good fun :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all mentions of a popular tech celebrity with Salacious B Crumb, a character from the star wars universe. It also has some fun with the name of companies. Finally, it makes an attempt to replace images of the protagonist with images of our favorite guy, Salacious B. This is all in good fun and all content is totally 100% family friendly.
